mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HABIT_ANALYSIS (HABIT_SQ, ANS_SQ, HABIT_COUNT) VALUES (#{habitSq}, #{ansSq}, #{habitCount})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM HABIT_ANALYSIS WHERE ANS_SQ = #{ansSq} AND habit_count > 0

SELECT a.interview_sq, NVL(SUM(d.habit_count),0) AS habit_count FROM habit_analysis d, answer c, question b, (SELECT interview_sq FROM interview WHERE mem_id = #{memId}) a WHERE b.interview_sq IN a.interview_sq AND c.quest_sq IN b.quest_sq AND d.ans_sq (+) IN c.ans_sq AND ROWNUM < 6 GROUP BY a.interview_sq ORDER BY a.interview_sq DESC

SELECT e.habit_gb ,SUM(d.habit_count) AS habit_count FROM habit e,habit_analysis d, answer c, question b, (SELECT interview_sq FROM interview WHERE mem_id = #{memId} AND ROWNUM < 6) a WHERE b.interview_sq IN a.interview_sq AND c.quest_sq IN b.quest_sq AND d.ans_sq IN c.ans_sq AND d.habit_sq IN e.habit_sq GROUP BY e.habit_gb ORDER BY habit_count DESC

SELECT ROWNUM rn, g.habit_gb, g.useCount FROM (SELECT f.habit_sq, f.habit_gb, NVL(sum(e.useCount) ,0) AS useCount FROM habit f, (SELECT d.habit_sq, NVL(SUM(d.habit_count),0) AS useCount, a.interview_date FROM interview a, question b, answer c, habit_analysis d WHERE a.interview_sq = b.interview_sq AND b.quest_sq = c.quest_sq AND c.ans_sq = d.ans_sq GROUP BY d.habit_sq, a.interview_date ORDER BY a.interview_date) e WHERE e.habit_sq (+) = f.habit_sq AND f.habit_st = 'Y'
AND e.interview_date(+) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND ${'sysdate'}
AND e.interview_date(+) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
GROUP BY f.habit_sq, f.habit_gb ORDER BY f.habit_sq)g
